name: monorepo
description: Monorepo containing l2p, VideoVault, payment, and auth projects

scripts.build:all: cd l2p && npm run build:all && cd ../auth && npm run build && cd ../VideoVault && npm run build && cd ../payment && npm run build
scripts.dev:all: concurrently -n "l2p-fe,l2p-be,vault,payment" -c "green,blue,yellow,magenta" "cd l2p && npm run dev:frontend" "cd l2p && npm run dev:backend" "cd VideoVault && npm run dev" "cd payment && npm run dev"
scripts.dev:all:web: concurrently -n "l2p-fe,l2p-be,vault,payment" -c "green,blue,yellow,magenta" "cd l2p && npm run dev:frontend" "cd l2p && npm run dev:backend" "cd VideoVault && npm run dev" "cd payment && npm run dev"
scripts.dev:l2p:parallel: cd l2p && concurrently -n "frontend,backend" -c "green,blue" "npm run dev:frontend" "npm run dev:backend"
scripts.install:all: cd l2p && npm run install:all && cd ../VideoVault && npm install && cd ../payment && npm install
scripts.test:all: npm --prefix l2p run test:all && npm --prefix auth run test && npm --prefix VideoVault run test && npm --prefix payment run test
scripts.check:deprecated: node -e "const fs=require('fs'); const path='package-lock.json'; if(!fs.existsSync(path)){console.log('No package-lock.json found.'); process.exit(0);} const lock=JSON.parse(fs.readFileSync(path,'utf8')); const deprecated=Object.entries(lock.packages||{}).filter(([,info])=>info.deprecated); if(!deprecated.length){console.log('No deprecated packages.'); process.exit(0);} deprecated.forEach(([name,info])=>{const pkg=name.replace(/^node_modules\//,''); console.log(pkg + ': ' + info.deprecated);}); process.exit(1);"
